text: Charl ir'Loran is a powerful and influential [[warlord|Karrnathi warlord]] of [[Karrnath]], and lord of the fortress-town [[Loran Rath]]. While he publicly supports King [[Kaius ir'Wynarn III]], he secretly leads efforts to derail peacemaking efforts and restart the [[Last War]].
title: Charl ir'Loran
tooltip: powerful and influential warlord of Karrnath, lord of Loran Rath
